item.title: AWS Summit India 2022 - Build a data lake with AWS Lake Formation
item.description:
AWS Summit India 2022 - Build a data lake with AWS Lake Formation

Overview

  • Organisations are breaking down data silos and building petabyte-scale data lakes on AWS to democratise access to thousands of end users. Since its launch, AWS Lake Formation has accelerated data lake adoption by making it easy to build and secure data lakes.

  • In this session, we explore data lake challenges and how AWS Lake Formation can help you. If you’re a developer, DBA, or a data engineer who works with data, this session is for you.
